## AuthenticatedFormDataUploader.getRequestOptions() method

Return the request options used for the fetch call.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRequestOptions(dataContent: FormData, meta?: FormDataPostHeaders): Promise<FormDataRequestOptions>;
```
